SELECT CASE s.degree WHEN 1 THEN '初中' WHEN 2 THEN '高中' WHEN 3 THEN '大专' WHEN 4 THEN '本科' WHEN 5 THEN '硕士' WHEN 6 THEN '博士' END as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM student s WHERE s.degree IS NOT NULL GROUP BY s.degree
SELECT c.name as clazz, COUNT(s.id) as value FROM clazz c LEFT JOIN student s ON c.id = s.clazz_id WHERE c.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY c.name
